speaker.whotheyare: Micah Eames is a communications professional, writer and public speaker who brings a touch of humor and compassion to difficult conversations.
speaker.whylisten:
Micah Eames' speaking engagements have covered everything from like mental health awareness and coming out to unconventional networking and diversity and inclusion in the workplace.

In past lives, Eames has been an ice cream scooper, social media manager, climbing coach and trivia host (a role he will happily reprise).
